mapper.sql: id, eid, user_id, code, type, parent_id, position_id, admin_flag, status, del_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
select u.id as userId, u.name, u.mobile, ee.eid, ee.id, ee.code, ee.status from enterprise_employee ee inner join user u on u.id = ee.user_id
ee.eid = #{request.eid} and ee.type = 2 and u.status != 9
and u.name like concat('%',#{request.name},'%')
and u.mobile like concat('%',#{request.mobile},'%')
and ee.code like concat('%',#{request.code},'%')
and ee.status = #{request.status}
and ee.del_flag = 0
